deep sea

Generated with <3 by 
{
    red: function(i, j) {
        var a=0,b=0,d=0,n=0;
        for(;a*a+(d=b*b)<4&&n++<1024;b=2*a*b+j/5e4+.06,a=a*a-d+i/5e4+.34);
        return n/4;
    },
    green: function(i, j) {
        return 4 * this.red(i, j);
    },
    blue: function(i, j) {
        return 6 * this.red(i, j)
    }
}
